actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To provide for free mailing privileges for members of the Armed Forces assigned to duty in the Persian Gulf area as part of Operation Desert Shield.

summary.text: Grants free mailing privileges to members of the armed forces assigned to duty in the Persian Gulf region as part of Operation Desert Shield. Provides for reimbursement of the Postal Service for matter sent in the mail under such authority from Department of Defense appropriations. Includes video-recorded communications as material subject to free delivery.

titles.title: To provide for free mailing privileges for members of the Armed Forces assigned to duty in the Persian Gulf area as part of Operation Desert Shield.
